COMMITTEE ON FINANCE
April 14, 1967
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
I have your letter of April 12th
with further reference to S. 1160.
Your comments have been carefully
noted, and I will be glad to do what
I can to be helpful.
